attributes.action: Denounce President Trump's Policy of Separating Children From Their Families.
attributes.additional_details:
The scars will deepen every day these children are separated from their families so please act NOW and sign my petition.

For an example of the ordeal being lived right now by thousands of children please follow the attached link http://www.standard.net/National/2018/06/16/America-is-better-than-this-What-a-doctor-saw-in-a-Texas-shelter-for-migrant-children
attributes.background: Thousands of children are being separated from their parents as they seek safety in the US. Trump's policy is a violation of human rights.The United Kingdom cannot stay silent. I implore the government to express to the US that its' policy is an affront to human rights.
